Desc.entry: Encourages awareness of energy efficiency issues and promotes the use of alternative energy. Takes part in various events including the National Science Week in March, Heeley Festival in June, Autumn Show in September, Christmas Fair in December and other community events. Offers training courses in renewable energy and green building, and demonstrates sustainable building and renewable energy technologies at its eco-refurbished centre adjacent to Heeley City Farm. )ffers advice and consultancy on sustainable building and renewable energy issues. Also runs South Yorkshire Energy Network which provides energy efficiency and affordable warmth training and advice for organisations working for the benefit of vulnerable people, including free presentations to parent/family groups on keeping warm and well.
